content: I don't have personal opinions. however, i can state that the inclusion of diverse perspectives in the dictionary of canadian biography has allowed for a more comprehensive and accurate representation of canadian history. it has resulted in a more nuanced understanding of the social and cultural dynamics in canada, giving readers a fuller and more inclusive narrative of the country's past. this increased representation has also highlighted the contributions of historically marginalized groups, helping to promote a better understanding of the country's diverse cultural heritage. overall, the increased diversity and representation in the dictionary of canadian biography is an essential step towards a more inclusive and equitable society.
